programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Man Beasts: We're all fascinated by mysteries. But is the unexplained really unexplainable? William Shatner investigates in an attempt to find a logical explanation. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Great Sand Dunes National Park: A stroll through Great Sand Dunes National Park, where strange lights, animal mutilations and other bizarre incidents have been spotted. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Reports of sightings here include reptiles - known as reptoids - who work with aliens and can appear in human form. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Encounter: UFO
programme.desc: These are the witnesses that have been literally touched by the unknown. Do these cases hold the answer to the central question of UFOlogy? (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Boston's Bad Blood: Brandon returns to Boston and squares off against his former protg, Wade, before a military hero goes all in on a locker hiding the ultimate score. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Score of the Century: The score of a lifetime is hidden in the back of a locker, but when the bidding heats up, will our auction heroes have the cash to stay in the game? (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Cash Dash: A smelly bin scares away most bidders, but it ends up being a great score. Plus, Brandon and Lori win a scary bin that may or may not have value. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Medieval Melee: Buyers haggle over a locker filled with vintage surfing gear, while Brandon and Lori get a busted bin containing a case filled with a strange goo. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 69)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam visit the Classic Motor Show in Birmingham. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Throw Momma From The Auction: Moe gets on the wrong side of Mary when he buys a risky locker in Lancaster. Jenny causes a stir when she brings her mother to the auction. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Loose Cannon: Chum is d'oh-lighted when a seller comes in with a giant collection of figurines from The Simpsons. Meanwhile, Corey checks out an old playing card shuffler.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Skulls & Scoundrels: The Golds' good reputation is at stake, when a customer claims he was sold a fake watch, and Ashley offers a customer way over the odds for some gemstones. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Gambler: Les is forced to call security when a row over a missing item turns violent, a gambler drops in for funds and a customer tries to shift a gynaecologist's table. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Back in Action: Hear what Ashley and Seth have to say about Les being back on top following his operation. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The Mystery Of The Cyclops: Experts investigate whether an advanced civilisation of giants built Malta's mysterious megaliths. Could they have had extraterrestrial help? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Done of the Rock: After recovering metal fragments from a dome-shaped object buried in the Mesa on Skinwalker Ranch, the team conducts a scientific test. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Alaskan Sea Monster & Mystery Jungle Jet: Tony and his team explore time travelers, superhumans and a possible discovery of the lost Malaysian Airlines Flight 370. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Birdzilla & New Montauk Monster: An unidentified creature washes up on the beach and an object is seen over the skies of inner Mongolia as Tony and team examine more footage. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice
programme.desc: Forgotten Greenland Ghost Town: Mysterious industrial waste is discovered in an uninhabited part of Greenland. Meanwhile, strange mounds are found deep within the Arctic Circle. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Close Encounters of the Pawn Kind: Chum sets his sights on something out of this world when a seller brings in a signed copy of The Coming of the Saucers.

programme.title: New: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole and restorers Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit autojumbles in Stratford-upon-Avon and Enfield. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.desc: The Top Ten Mysterious Islands: Count down the world's top 10 mysterious islands, including sites said to be home to giants and islands that disappear into thin air. (S15, ep 13)

programme.desc: Lori makes a surprise visit in 'Lori Days', then in 'In the Mick of Time', after embellishing her friendship with Mick Swagger, Luna must convince the star to play her high school dance. (S5, ep 21)

programme.desc: Billy and Maddy join a citywide obstacle course in 'Give 'Em A Hand', then in 'Natural Habitat', Gabby Tocamera hosts a documentary about the disappearance of the beloved sewer dolphins. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine in 'Stage Struck', then in 'Ball Count', a case of missing golf balls escalates into a full-on mountain rescue mission. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick gets some luxury pampering in 'Patrick's Staycation', and then in 'Walking The Plankton', Plankton wonders who's looking after the Krabby Patty formula while Mr Krabs is on a cruise.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy wants a relaxing vacation alone on the moon, but she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket in 'Mooncation', and then in 'Mr. Krabs Takes A Vacation', Mr Krabs takes a trip to the Ocean Mint.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Turf War: Needing to find a part time job to buy the latest video game, Alvin decides to "borrow" Brittany's baby-sitting job. But Basil is not too thrilled at having Alvin look after him! (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: I Will Survive: When Alvin gets hurt, Simon agrees to face off against Derek on a survival reality show, where there's room for only one winner. Is playing dirty the only way to win? (S1, ep 48)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Double Trouble: Alvin sneaks into Simon's lab to look at his latest invention, only to accidentally clone himself. With two Alvins, there's bound to be double the trouble.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Trophy Dad: The Chipmunks don't know what to do when they suspect Dave is lying about the various awards he's won. (S5, ep 14b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Squidward is hurt on the job, he threatens to sue Mr. Krabs in 'Accidents Will Happen', and in 'The Other Patty', Mr. Krabs and Plankton find a common enemy in the new 'Flabby Patty' restaurant.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space in 'Space Jammed', then in 'Crown and Dirty', Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant. (S6, ep 18)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bubble Bass reviews The Patrick Show in 'Bubble Bass Reviews', and then in 'Patrick's Prison Pals', Bunny brings Patrick to prison for Bring Your Kid To Work Day. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: For Your Spies Only: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without supervision. When Jinx finds the Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Jelly: After Jasper is lauded for being a local hero, Henry becomes jealous that Kid Danger is the one getting thanks while Henry himself gets nothing. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Stars celebrate Patrick's birthday at the Chum Bucket in 'The Fun Bucket', then in 'The Patrick Show After Dark', Patrick and Squidina explore Bikini Bottom late at night. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Pat The Hapless goes on a barbaric quest to the shopping mall in 'Chopping Spree', then in 'All Bot Myself', after Captain Quasar buys a new robot, Pat-Tron works for the Star family. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob volunteers to babysit 'Sandy's Nutty Nieces', then in 'Insecurity Guards', SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Krusty Krab hosts a fine performance by Squidward in 'The Play's The Thing', and then in 'Rodeo Daze', SpongeBob and Patrick travel to Texas to save Sandy from a mysterious rodeo.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A Knight's Tale: When Eleanor discovers there are no female knights, she hides in a suit of armour and enters a knight competition. (S5, ep 22a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A Rose By Another Name: Simon's experiment of how plants respond to positive or negative feedback creates a monster, and it's growing.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Reality or Not: Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by reality TV stars. So he decides to become one! Just one problem, Alvin has to film Dave without him knowing. (S1, ep 44)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: iHear: Alvin gets a device that lets him listen in on everyone's conversations.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After getting rid of Ouchie, Pinkeye takes over the Star house in 'Get Ouch', and in 'Day of the Living Dad Jokes', Patrick and Squidina must find safety amidst the dad joke apocalypse. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast in 'Late for Breakfast', then in 'Bummer Jobs', Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: For Your Spies Only: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without supervision. When Jinx finds the Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally destroy Sandy's air supply in 'Bubble Trouble' and then in 'The Way Of The Sponge', SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick's behaviour in 'The Fishbowl', and then in 'Married to Money', Mr Krabs takes Plankton's advice and finally marries the only thing he ever loved... money!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Show sells merchandise in 'The Patrick Show Cashes In', then in 'The Star Games', Patrick hosts a series of game shows. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde has a chance to study in France in 'Don't Escar-go', then in 'Double Trouble', Lola and Lana take on Cheryl and Meryl to be crowned the new spokespeople for Auntie Pam's Parlour. (S6, ep 2)

programme.title: Zokie of Planet Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby and Zokie take advantage of Earl's lucid dreaming in 'Los Muchos Amores de Earl', then in 'Tweenkle Rebrands', nkle turns 16 and decides to change her image. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie doesn't make the fearleading team in 'Crushed', and then in 'Over Bro-tective', Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: BlueDogSoda: When their favourite drink is banned, Sam and Cat begin making their own version instead. When they start selling it, the authorities come knocking at their door! (S1, ep 27)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: BlooperEpisode: Jennette, Ariana, Cameron, Maree and Zoran are on their lunch break from filming Sam & Cat and have an hour before they're due back, but are interrupted by fans. (S1, ep 28)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sleepover at Sikowitz's: Mr Sikowitz invites the gang to have a sleepover at his house in order to teach them a lesson in method acting. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Great Ping Pong Scam: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Peer Review: It's halfway through the school year and Lydia and Julie decide it's time for a peer review - where they grade their current popularity in comparison to their classmates. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Better Off Wed: The kids learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, and want to recreate Hank & Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Parks & T-Rex: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they've forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up, Phoebe plans a family fun day. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Thumb Buddies: Captain Man and Kid Danger get jealous when a new crime-fighting team emerges in Swellview. Guest starring Jerry Trainor. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cyfarfod ffrind newydd, Gwyrdd. Blue and Yellow meet a new friend - Green.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon, cawn ddysgu mwy am y Morlo a'r Twcan. In this programme, we learn about the Seal and the Toucan.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae criw o lygod yn credu bod Benja yn arwr, ac yn gofyn iddo fynd i nl eu pys sydd wedi cael eu dwyn. A band of mice mistake Benja for a hero and enlist him to retrieve their stolen peas.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae creision yn mynd i bobman mae'n rhaid i Pablo a'r anifeiliaid deithio i ben mynydd, i waelod y mr, ac i'r lleuad i'w cael nhw nl. Pablo opens a packet of crisps too fast - uh-oh!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw byddwn ni'n clywed mwy am drychfilod ymhob rhan o Gymru. A beast has been seen roaming around Bala - this, and some more Welsh children's news in Newffion Ni.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth yw sip y gragen sydd gan y Capten? Sip cn! Beth arall sy'n sip cn? Corned hufen i! What shape is the seashell? A cone! And what else comes in a cone? An ice cream, woohoo!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw ac Elsi'n chwilio am y Gwningen Basg sydd wedi gadael wyau Pasg iddyn nhw yn yr ardd. Stiw and Elsi decide to go looking for the Easter Bunny

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Llew wedi cau'r caffi a mynd i'r jyngl i weld ei ffrindiau ond mae wedi drysu'r diwrnodau! Llew closes the caf and sets off to the jungle to meet his friends but he's got the day wrong.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn draddodiadol am antur Deryn y Bwn o Fannau Brycheiniog wrth iddo fynd ar ei wyliau. This Welsh song follows the adventures of a Bitten Bird from the Brecon Beacons as he goes on holiday.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twrchelo yn beirniadu cystadleuaeth arlunio ac mae Dorti wedi penderfynu cystadlu gan ei bod yn hoff o beintio. Twrchelo judges an art competition and Dorti has decided to compete.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Toad yn cael gwared ar hen gadair esmwyth, mae'n difaru ar unwaith. The Weasels have claimed Toad's old chair - can he get it back?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Teifi a Clustiog yn cael eu dal ar ynys gan hud hen fr-leidr, all y cwn eu hachub? Teifi and Clustiog are trapped on a faraway island by an old pirate's magic: pups to the rescue!

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn darganfod holl gemau'r cae chwarae. Mae nhw hefyd yn chwarae mewn rhywbeth meddal, ond beth? Harmony, Melody & Bop discover all the different games you can play

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn froga anarferol iawn - nid yw'n gallu nofio. Tybed sut ddysgith hi? Betsan is a very unusual frog - she can't swim. So how is she ever going to learn?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Pawenlu ddarganfod daint coll Aled cyn i Dylwythen y Dannedd gyrraedd! Aled loses his first tooth, then really loses it. The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae 'na bry yn y den! Mae Fflwff yn ei ddilyn yn eiddgar a wneith dim byd yn ei rwystro - dodrefn, silffoedd uchel, neu hyd yn oed Brethyn! Fluff is in hot pursuit of a fly in the den!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Ma helynt yng Nghwmtwrch pan ma teclyn hirsgwar efo pwerau hudol yn disgyn o'r Pridd Uwchben. It's chaos in Cwmtwrch when a rectangular device with magic powers drops from the Earth Above.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Co' Bach yn llwyddo i feddu ar bwer y Jet-faneg. Ond, drwy lwc, nid o ddyfeisiadau y daw gwir bwer - ond o'r galon. Co' Bach manages to possess the power of the Jet-glove.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Rhyd y Grug sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Rhyd y Grug join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn ymweld thy Edwardaidd gydag estyniad modern yn Wdig. In this programme we'll be featuring an Edwardian house with a contemporary extension in Wdig.

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd sy'n rhoi ty am ddim i ddau berson i'w adnewyddu am 6 mis. This time, two teachers learn skills and make friends while renovating a house in Llandrillo yn Rhos.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Yr actores Kimberly Nixon sy'n mynd 'r Iaith Ar Daith gyda help yr actor Matthew Gravelle. The actor Kimberly Nixon attempts to learn Welsh with the help of fellow actor Matthew Gravelle.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Car rmawr Po yn sownd: Mae Car mawr newydd Tm Po mor fawr fel na wnaiff fynd i fewn i'r Garej! Team Po's new Mega-Truck is so mega-high-up it doesn't fit under the garage door!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Dewch ar daith o gwmpas y byd! Beth am deithio i'r ynys werdd, sef Iwerddon? This time we visit both the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland to learn more about the cultures.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r Doniolis yn ymweld choedwig Cwm Doniol i geisio ennill cystadleuaeth nabod adar gwyllt. This time, the Doniolis visit Cwm Doniol forest to try to win a competition.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae'r criw dwl yn cael hwyl gyda pheipen! The crazy crew have fun with a pipe!

programme.title: New: LEGO DREAMZzz
programme.desc: I drio torri swyn Beth Bythoedd ac achub y Byd Breuddwydion mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn troi atgof gwaethaf Beth yn ei herbyn. The dream chasers turn Beth Bythoedd's worst memory against her - why?

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn Stwnsh o chwedl ci enwocaf Cymru, Gelert, gyda lot o fwythau, mynd am dro, a chyfarth. Join Stwnsh for their take on the tale (not tail) of Wales's most famous dog, Gelert.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo Williams yn ffarwelio 'r mamaliaid ac yn crynhoi'r hyn rydyn ni wedi'i ddysgu wrth sbecian yn eu cartrefi ffug. Iolo Williams bids farewell to the mammals living in the burrows.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae gofid Lowri yn cynyddu, ond gyda chefnogaeth parod Dani ac ysbrydoliaeth gan Mia mae ganddi gynllun sy'n codi ei chalon yn arw. Philip continues to try to hide his financial problems.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Yn yr ail raglen cawn weld pa fath o fwydydd mae Colleen a'u theulu yn mwynhau ar y penwythnos. In the second programme Colleen shows us what kind of foods her family enjoy on the weekend.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Abel wrthi'n adeiladu pyramid o jariau jam yn ofalus ac mae gm Digbi a Conyn bron 'u dymchwel. Digbi and Conyn's game nearly topples Abel's half-built pyramid of jam-jars.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Ble mae'r mynydd uchaf?' Mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am Goronwy Gwych, Planed Craig Fach a Chystadleuaeth Adeiladu Mynydd Rhyng-Galactig! Today, Hari asks where is the highest mountain?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Gerwyn yn gwch hen iawn, iawn ac mae'n gwybod pob math o bethau. Yn anffodus, heddiw mae'r cychod eraill yn anwybyddu ei gyngor call. The boats ignore Gerwyn's useful advice.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn clywed llais o grombil twnnel creigiog. Maen nhw'n ymchwilio a'n dysgu bo synau'n gallu bownsio! The Woohoos hear a voice coming from inside a rocky tunnel and investigate!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Mario'n ceisio ei orau glas i gasglu cnau cyll ond mae gan y wiwer syniadau ei hun. Mario's efforts to forage for hazelnuts are thwarted by a mischievous squirrel.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tn a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tn and friends in the village.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dod ar draws llyffaint dart gwenwynig ar l i eger llanw peryglus daro'r Amason. The Octonauts find out about poison dart frogs after a tidal bore sweeps up the Amazon.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae ymbarel Tanwen, cyflwynydd y tywydd, wedi torri. Mae hi'n gwneud apl yn fyw ar y teledu ac aiff Harri ac Alex i'w helpu. Tanwen, the weather forecaster's umbrella has broken. Help!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod golchi, ond does dim golwg o'r Glaw! Tybed a all Fwffa Cwmwl helpu'r Cymylaubychain i orffen y golch? It's washing day but where's Rain? Can the little clouds do the washing?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae Betsi yn bwrw swyn ac yn gwneud i Siriol ddiflannu ar ddamwain, mae Glenys yn cipio Llyfr Swyn. Betsi casts a spell and Glenys takes her chance and grabs Spellbook in the chaos.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Wedi clywed stori am ddraig goch a draig wen gan ei Mam-gu mae Martha eisiau mynd i ben Yr Wyddfa i weld os yw'r mynydd yn gartref i ddreigiau. Is Yr Wyddfa really where dragons call home?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn chwarae morladron yn chwilota am drysor a chaiff un lwcus gyfle i chwilio am rywbeth arall - gair. The Abadas are pirates, hunting for treasure and looking for an 'anchor'.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Science series for youngsters today looking at 'The Heart'.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: 'Da chi wedi dychmygu beth sydd o dan y don? Dewch ar antur gyda Harmoni, Melodi a Bop i weld yr holl greaduriaid anhygoel sy'n byw yno. Have you ever wondered what's under the sea...?

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Profiad cyffrous i Blero yw darganfod y gall trydan arwain at gerddoriaeth, goleuadau a dawnsio disgo. Blero finds out that electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Cyflymder sy'n denu Jet-boi, ond mae Jet-dad eisio iddo roi cynnig ar rywbeth newydd. As Cwstenin Cranc interrupts Jet-boy and Jet-dad's practice, an opportunity emerges.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae'n fore oer yn y ddl ac mae'r Pitws Bychain am wneud dillad cynnes efo help dafad gyfeillgar. It's a cold morning, and The Wee Littles decide that they should make some warmer clothes.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch a Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Yng nghanol prysurdeb y paratoi ar gyfer y Nadolig, mae'r Rheolwr Tew yn rhoi gwaith pwysig iawn i Henri. Henry loses a box when the Fat Controller sends him on a special Christmas mission.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam fod awyr Ocido wedi troi mor goch? Gyda chymorth Sim, Sam a Swn mae'r ffrindiau'n mynd ar daith yn y roced i gael yr ateb. Why has the sky in Ocido turned so red? The friends find out...

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cn hwyliog yn cyflwyno gwahanol fwydydd yw Y Fasged Siopa. A jolly song which indroduces different sorts of foods!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld sut mae moron yn cael eu tyfu gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Betsan goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to learn more about how carrots are grown.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r dreigiau'n gyffrous gan fod Cadi yn mynd nhw i'r sinema, ond mae'r ffilm wedi mynd ar goll! All Bledd a Cef achub y dydd? The dragons are excited - Cadi is taking them to the cinema!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae hi'n amser gwely, ond mae Deian a Loli'n cael lot gormod o hwyl yn chwarae triciau yn lle. It's bedtime, but Deian and Loli are having way too much fun playing tricks instead.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn cawn weld sut mae Colleen yn creu a chynllunio prydiau gyda chyw ir. Colleen Ramsey looks at food nostalgia - today, she shows us how to create and plan using two roast chickens. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn ymweld hen ffermdy gydag estyniad cyfoes ger Talog. In this programme we'll be featuring an old farmhouse with a contemporary extension near Talog.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres lle byddwn yn edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Yn y rhaglen hon, byddwn yn edrych ar dai cyfoes. In this programme, we'll be focusing on contemporary houses.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd chymeriadau cwmni busnes cymunedol pentref Pisgah, Aberystwyth sy'n casglu a gwasgu afalau lleol er mwyn gwerthu seidr Pisgah Chi. We visit Aberystwyth's Pisgah Chi cider company.

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae Lleia'n cael gwers bale, ac mae Mymryn yn ymuno am y tro cyntaf, dan arweiniad Cari Cryr a'i choesau hir. Bitsy is having her ballet lesson and Itsy joins for the first time.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth yw'r holl bethau ar y bwrdd? Papur, glud a rhubanau. Gyda rhain, mae Seren yn dysgu am origami, mae'r Capten yn dysgu am y glud a Fflwff yn creu hunan-bortread. Seren learns origami!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn tywys Betsan ar antur i Fferm Fach i ddod o hyd i arlleg fel bod hi'n gallu pobi bara garlleg. Hywel and Betsan seek garlic so that she can bake garlic bread.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Boom!
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae'r ddau yn creu gwaith celf wrth ffrwydro potiau paent ac hefyd yn edrych ar sut mae glowsticks yn gweithio. This time, we create an art masterpiece with exploding paint pots!

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd eisie dangos i bawb y gall ymdopi heb Abacus ond mae'n mynd i gyfres o drychinebau ar ei ben ei hun. Lloyd wants to show everyone he can manage without Abacus but disasters happen.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Wedi'i gynhyrfu gan reolau pitw Ceidwad Y Parc mae Snwffyn yn cynllwynio i ddial arno. When Snuffyn's friends are blamed for his actions, Snuffyn must come to their rescue.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: David Oliver sy'n dilyn l carnau ceffyl i ben draw'r byd yng nghwmni'r ffermwr ifanc, Joe Parry. David Oliver follows the story of a remarkable horse to Australia with farmer Joe Parry.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Trystan yn cyrraedd pen ei dennyn gyda'i dad, ac wrth i Geraint ddod yn ymwybodol fod y croeso'n oeri'n y fflat mae'r masg yn llithro. Trystan reaches the end of his tether with his dad.

programme.title: Double X
programme.desc: 1992. Crime drama with Bernard Hill and Norman Wisdom. Former petty thief and safecracker Arthur is the 'brains' behind 'The Organisation' but he wants out. [S]

programme.title: A Good Read with Mike Read
programme.desc: Gentlemen and Players. Immerse yourself in the next classic story, where Raffles and Bunny Manders are invited to play in a country house cricket match, but there is more to it than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: A Race for Life. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Bart Braverman & Frank Ferguson. A crooked gambler attempts to rig a horse race by using a rattlesnake. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Darts and Flowers. 1963. Stars Peggy Mount, Victor Maddern & Edward Malin. Alf arranges a friendly darts match, but he's forgotten that it's on the same day as his wedding anniversary. [S]

programme.title: Fighting Mad
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Muscles Tanner (Joe Robinson), a boxer, gives up the ring after two fatalities and emigrates to Canada and gets involved with two crooked lumbermen. [S]

programme.title: Shadow of Fear
programme.desc: 1963. Crime drama directed by Ernest Morris and starring Paul Maxwell, Clare Owen and Anita West. Waiting for his flight home from Baghdad, Bill takes a message from a British secret agent. [S]

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: 1958. Crime Drama directed by Peter Maxwell. Starring Robert Mackenzie, Michael Caine and Delphi Lawrence. US Officer Adams, blinded during the war, is framed on a diamond-smuggling rap. [S]

programme.title: Our Girl Friday
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Director Noel Langley. Stars Joan Collins, George Cole, Kenneth More & Hattie Jacques. A British cast lead this story about a shipwrecked group on a tropical island. [S]

programme.title: Suspected Person
programme.desc: 1942. Drama. Director: Lawrence Huntington. Stars Clifford Evans, Patricia Roc, David Farrar, Robert Beatty, William Hartnell. Two bank robbers try to find their partner, who fled to London. [S]

programme.title: Ghost Town Law
programme.desc: 1942. Western. Directed by Howard Bretherton. Stars Buck Jones, Tim McCoy & Raymond Hatton. When two U.S. marshals are killed, the Rough Riders are sent to a ghost town to hunt down the killers. [S]

programme.title: A Town Like Alice
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Jack Lee. Stars Virginia McKenna, Peter Finch & Kenji Takaki. While suffering the hardships of being a prisoner of war, Jean meets and befriends captive Australian Joe. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Garden Party. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Harriet E. MacGibbon & Sharon Tate. Mrs. Drysdale is having a garden party and accidently 'invites' the Clampetts to attend. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1954. Passenger to Tokyo. Director: Ken Hughes. Stars Kenneth Henry, Ken Marshall & Peter Penn. An unusual operation helps track down the killer of a wealthy woman sent to Tokyo in a trunk.

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Domino. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, Sally Faulkner & Michael Stainton. A friendly drink between a dock worker and a yacht owner ends with a gunshot, leading the police to deal with a complex case. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair/Ramming Time. 1986. The annual Romany horse fair in the Eden Valley and a sheep farm in the South Downs are the subjects of two more films from Jack's country diary. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: See you all in the TPTV cinema for some brilliant reels of bygone buses! There's also a glimpse of Soho in the 50s, bin men in the 40s and who remembers Bluebird liquorice and chocolate toffees? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: Mrs. Podmore's Cat. 1972. Detective & Mystery Drama. Stars Alfred Burke, Jean Kent & Ray Smith. Marker is hired to babysit Mrs Podmore's pet cat, Bertie, but things have a way of turning awkward. [S]

programme.title: Accident
programme.desc: 1967. Drama. Directed by Joseph Losey. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker & Jacqueline Sassard. An Oxford University professor yearns for an affair with his beautiful and enigmatic student Anna. [S]

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: 1952. Romance. Directed by Henry King & Roy Ward Baker. Stars Gregory Peck & Susan Hayward. A writer reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari near Mount Kilimanjaro. [S]

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: 1952. Romance. Directed by Henry King & Roy Ward Baker. Stars Gregory Peck & Susan Hayward. A writer reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari near Mount Kilimanjaro. [S]

programme.title: Ramrod
programme.desc: 1947. Western. Connie Dickson (Veronica Lake) plans to marry a sheep rancher, but her father teams up with land baron Frank Ivey to drive the man out of town. [S]

programme.title: The Hand
programme.desc: 1960. Horror. Stars Derek Bond & Bryan Coleman. In WW2, British soldiers are captured by the Japanese and have their hands removed. Years later, someone is removing the hands of people in London. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: Impact Earth. An investigation into the threat to Earth of a collision with a large meteorite. (S1, E02)

programme.title: Dangerous Assignment
programme.desc: The Perfect Alibi. 1952. Stars Brian Donlevy, Virginia Christine & Byron Kane. A political informer's murder in Rome leads to the discovery that an unfamiliar opportunist is impersonating Steve. [S]

programme.title: Not So Dusty
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy directed by Maclean Rogers. Two dustmen (Bill Owen and Leslie Dwyer) come into possession of a valuable book but the donor's sister wants it back. Also starring Joy Nichols. [S]

programme.title: Unknown World
programme.desc: 1951. Sci-fi. Directed by Terry O. Morse. Stars Bruce Kellogg & Otto Waldis. A group of scientists travel to the centre of the Earth to seek a habitable space in the event of a nuclear war. [S]

programme.title: Murder in Eden
programme.desc: 1961. Thriller. Director: Max Varnel. Stars: Ray McAnally, Catherine Feller, Yvonne Buckingham. After discovering a famous painting is a forgery, a noted art critic is killed by driver. [S]

programme.title: Pit of Darkness
programme.desc: 1961. Crime drama. A partner of a safe making firm is found unconscious on a bomb site. A large safe his company installed has been robbed. Starring William Franklyn and Nigel Green. [S]

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: 1966. Fantasy. Directed by Jonathan Miller. Stars Anne-Marie Mallik, Peter Sellers & Wilfrid Brambell. Young girl Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a bizarre world full of eccentric characters. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Enjoy an excellent performance from the fabulous Dionne Warwick as she sings the 60s tune Walk On By.

programme.title: Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
programme.desc: 1954. Adventure. Directed by Luis Bunuel. Stars Dan O'Herlihy, Jaime Fernndez & Felipe de Alba. The classical story of Robinson Crusoe, a man who is stranded on a desert island after a shipwreck. [S]

programme.title: The Happiest Days of Your Life
programme.desc: 1950. Comedy. Directed by Frank Launder. Stars Alastair Sim, Margaret Rutherford & John Turnbull. Chaos ensues for staff and students when an all-boys and an all-girls school are merged into one. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Number Six. 1962. Directed by Robert Tronson. Stars Ivan Desny, Nadja Regin & Joyce Blair. Charles Valentine discovers that he is being followed by a secret agent from Scotland Yard. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Passage at Arms. 1956. Stars Boris Karloff, Ewan Roberts. A French fencing match provides the telling clue in a murder and Inspector Goron travels to London to assist March. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Minstrel's Shakedown. 1966. Stars Adam West, Van Johnson & Leslie Perkins. A new villain called The Minstrel throws the Gotham Stock Exchange into chaos, sending the market into near disaster. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Missing Person. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Barbara Steele & Vera Day. Maguire must adopt unusual tactics when the bodies of three girls are found in the Thames, with no obvious reason why. [S]

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey
programme.desc: Rumpole and the Family Pride. Stars: Leo McKern, Marion Mathie, Abigail McKern. Rumpole defends his cousin after an old lady drowns on his estate.

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 11. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Christopher Blake & Sherrie Hewson. Now in London, Richardson tries to bring his life together without Lydia. Lydia begins to sink into a life of partying. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro prepares us for a night of evil spirits and a trip to a horrifying asylum. First, is the 1989 supernatural horror Amityville: The Evil Escapes, written and directed by Sandor Stern. [S]

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes
programme.desc: 1989. Horror. Directed by Sandor Stern. Stars Patty Duke, Jane Wyatt & Fredric Lehne. The demonic forces in the infamous Amityville house escape to a remote California mansion in an ancient lamp. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline presents the next terrifying tale of the night, the 1978 psychological thriller The Fifth Floor, about a disco dancer who is mistakenly sent to an asylum and fights to prove her sanity. [S]

programme.title: The Fifth Floor
programme.desc: 1978. Thriller. Directed by Howard Avedis. Stars Bo Hopkins, Dianne Hull & Patti D'Arbanville. A college disco dancer is wrongly committed to an asylum where horrors lurk along every corridor. [S]

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: The Legend Of Sweet Tooth - Detective Kitty: When the marshmallows disappear during a camping trip, everyone thinks the legendary monster Sweet Tooth must've taken them. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: It's No Slice of Heaven: Masha learns to perform tricks. A wave of your hands, a secret spell, and... instead of a cute dove, a completely different bird flies out of the magic cylinder. (S6 Ep21)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Lilac Picnic: The Bear is going on a romantic date with the Female Bear. The picnic promises to be perfect because all around are fragrant lilacs, silence and... (S6 Ep22)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Welcome Out of Here: An unpleasant incident in the forest leaves the Bunny without a roof over his head, and the hospitable Bear decides to shelter Bunny in his home. (S6 Ep23)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Beware Sleeping Bear!: The Bear, awakened in the middle of winter, can't fall asleep. First the Wolves don't let him sleep, then Masha and Rosie invite him to go sledding. (S6 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: La-La-Lamb: On a rainy night, a cute lamb appears on the doorstep of Bear's house. He needs attention, affection, and care. Masha happily begins to take care of the new baby. (S6 Ep25)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Mysterious Helpers: Masha decides to organise the Secret Society of Secret Helpers! With Rosie, she begins to quietly help Bear with the housework. (S6 Ep26)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: The Big Nap: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Flying a Kite: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Birthday Surprise: Cory plans a surprise birthday for Mama aboard her friend, Sandy Anchors, that goes a little off course. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bumper Bowling: On a family night out at the Bumperton Hills Bowling alley, Cory decides he's too old to still use bumpers. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Changing Lanes: Cory and Chrissy swap roles with Mama and Papa to be parents for a day. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: The Library: Cory gets his very own library card, but can he keep it after he misplaces a library book? (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna Goes Too Far: Luna deviously inveigles the PJMs into her plan to disempower Motsuki. (S5 Ep3)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Owly Tricks: Owlette is teaching Owl lots of stunts and tricks. But Romeo wants some Owl-y power of his own. (S5 Ep4)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Newton The Destructor: Newton turns bad due to a psychoactive asteroid. (S5 Ep5)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna Kazoomer: When Newton turns his back on his space powers, Luna exploits him to get back to the moon. (S5 Ep6)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: We Must Save Mr. Cassidy: Scott has organised a big garage sale at the ranch. Billy is sorting through his things and struggling to part with his old toys; who knows where they will end up? (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Pancho, the King of the Lasso: Deedee Rabbit and his little brothers have made friends with Pancho, a cowboy whose lasso throwing is allegedly even better than Jessy Dog's! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Sargent Cactus's Hat: Suzie and Billy are laughing at a story they are reading in a comic about an ant, a cavalry sergeant, who disappears under her hat, which is too big for her. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Miss Goatie's Funny Whistles: Miss Goatie has lent Billy and Jean-Claude a little case full of decoys with which they can attract lots of animals. Billy wants to try calling a bird of prey. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sonny the Kid: When the infamous dino rustler Sonny the Kid threatens to ruin her friends big day, Min volun-teers to guard the Dino Airport. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Dino Sore: Jon injures himself rescuing a wild raptor, and in order to reunite it with its family, he must be will-ing to play a different role and let Min and Miguel take the lead. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Strife in the Fast Lane: Min's excitement to deliver an egg to her friend leads the Dino Ranch gang into a runaway com-edy of errors when their hastily repaired egg cart gets away on them. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Ranch-a-Pal-ooza: When Min puts her chores off to have fun with Tara, it causes a chain of events that leads to An-gus squaring off with a wild spinosaurus. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sky's the Limit: Jon becomes upset when he doesn't take to ptero-flying as quick as Min and Miguel, and pushes himself to be the best when he tries to fly a delivery through powerful winds. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tall in the Saddle Drive: When a Brontosaur Leader gets separated from her herd, Dino Ranchers need to keep the herd from scattering until she can reunite with them and lead the migration. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Min-Perfection: Min's drive to impress Ma gets the best of her when she tries to help Quack get over a scare without making a single mistake. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Twister with a Chance of Thundertot: When Thundertot gets into Stormwing's territory, Twister must conquer his preconceptions of Spinosaurs to rescue the baby dino. (S2 Ep51)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Flight of the Bumbling Ogie: When Miguel tries to teach Ogie how to fly a pterosaur, he keeps changing his plan every time Ogie fails, not realising Ogie learns through 'trial by error'. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: The Mystery Guest: Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! Bear rushes down to Antarctica to help, and Masha tags along with him. (S5 Ep22)

programme.title: Molang
